name: Taeksi woonjunsa
description: Taeksi woonjunsa is a movie starring Kang-ho Song, Thomas Kretschmann, and Hae-jin Yoo. A widowed father and taxi driver who drives a German reporter from Seoul to Gwangju to cover the 1980 uprising, soon finds himself regretting...
keywords: taxi driver,gwangju south korea,car chase,beating,car crash
